channel.title: The Short talk Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast
channel.itunes:author: TALHAUK
channel.itunes:summary: The Short Talk Podcast: Cuppa boys waffling straight facts with #nofilter about life, people, politics and more Have a look at the world in the view of a few 18 year olds stuck in lockdown from the Great Britain!!
